amendment.description: An amendment numbered 46 printed in Part A of House Report 118-602 to reduce funding for the Delta Regional Commission to FY19 levels and transfer the difference to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce the account for the Delta Regional Authority by $7,100,000 and apply the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A022) Failed by recorded vote: 121 - 298 (Roll no. 368).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A022) Failed by recorded vote: 121 - 298 (Roll no. 368).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
